meanings.definition: A person of Eastern European descent, especially a laborer or immigrant.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood was filled with hardworking bohunks.
meanings.sent2: The bohunks arrived in search of a better life.
meanings.sent3: The bohunks at the construction site always had a smile on their faces.
meanings.sent4: The bohunks were the backbone of the industrial revolution.
meanings.sent5: The bohunks' strong work ethic was admired by all.

meanings.definition: Used as a derogatory term for someone perceived as uncultured or unsophisticated.
meanings.sent1: She made a bohunks comment about his taste in music.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of bohunks individuals.
meanings.sent3: His bohunks behavior at the fancy restaurant caused a stir.
meanings.sent4: The bohunks attitude of the guests was quite evident.
meanings.sent5: Her bohunks manners were a topic of discussion among the guests.
